wikitext.*:
[[File:Quentandil - Gondolin Map.png|thumb|Map of Gondolin showing the Arch]]
The '''Arch of Inwë''' was located in [[Gondolin]] according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. 

It was the western entrance to the [[Square of the Folkwell]]. During the [[Fall of Gondolin]], [[Galdor (elf of Gondolin)|Galdor]] and his last men fought there against an incoming horde of [[goblins]].<ref>{{LT2|III}}, pp. 182-183</ref> The origin of its name, concerning [[Ingwë#Other versions of the legendarium|Inwë]], is unknown as it is only mentioned once.
